description: Main source file for a Flutter app implementing the 2048 game. It initializes the app, sets up themes, providers, and the main UI scaffold including score and control bars, and a placeholder for the game board.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up theme, provider, and main app scaffold.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Main scaffold containing the app bar, score bar, control bar, and game placeholder.

classes.name: _PlaceholderSurface
classes.description: Placeholder widget indicating where the game board will be added.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, initializes and runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp, returns widget tree with provider and MaterialApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _RootScaffold, creates the main scaffold with gradient background.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _PlaceholderSurface, displays a placeholder message.
